languageChanged.en: Language has been changed to English.

welcome.en: Hey there, {firstName}! üëã I'm your personal journal buddy! I'm here to help you reflect, grow, and have some fun along the way. Before we dive in, I'd love to get to know you better. First things first - what name would you like me to call you?

niceMeet.en: Nice to meet you, {name}! üòä How old are you? Feel free to pick from these options:

thanks.en: Thanks! And what gender do you identify as?

gotIt.en: Got it! What do you do for work or study?

almostDone.en: Almost done! Now for the fun part - tell me a bit more about yourself! üí´ Feel free to share anything you want, like you're introducing yourself to a new friend (which I am, actually!). Some things you might want to share: ‚Ä¢ Where are you from? ‚Ä¢ Where are you living now? ‚Ä¢ Do you travel often? ‚Ä¢ Are you in a relationship? ‚Ä¢ What sports or physical activities do you enjoy? ‚Ä¢ What are your hobbies? ‚Ä¢ What are your dreams and goals? ‚Ä¢ Do you have any pets? ‚Ä¢ Any spiritual practices? You can reply with text, voice message, or even a video!

amazing.en: Amazing! Thanks for sharing, {name}! üéâ I'm so excited to be your journal buddy. Let's start this journey together!

welcomeAboard.en: Welcome aboard, {name}! üéâ I'm so excited to be your journal buddy. Let's start this journey together!
